text:
论 2026 年最强 AI 员工：Clawdbot (现更名 Moltbot) 究竟多离谱？ 

家人们谁懂啊！最近硅谷那只“大龙虾” Clawdbot 真的让我笑死又吓死：

 改名梗：
Anthropic：你这名字太像我了，律师函警告！
创始人：行，我改。既然龙虾要长大就得脱壳，那我就叫 Moltbot 吧。
（冷知识：Molt

Clawdbot is a cool idea but is basically useless as it hits rate limits on shit that should not be using so many tokens.

Seems extremely inefficient out of the box. And it’s a total pain in the ass to add OpenRouter… it blows up just trying to add back up models.

Thread 10/12
Key files to know:
- Config: ~/.clawdbot/moltbot.json
- Credentials: ~/.clawdbot/credentials/whatsapp
- Environment: /volume2/docker/moltbot/.env
- Auth override: ~/.clawdbot/agents/main/agent/auth-profiles.json

Thread 9/12
Fix for auth errors:

Find and edit:
```
/home/[user]/.clawdbot/agents/main/agent/auth-profiles.json
```

Make sure the API key there matches your .env file, then:
```
docker compose restart moltbot-gateway
```

Moltbot(Clawdbot)をインストールする為、gitbubのREADMEに従ってインストールコマンドを実行するとhello, moltbotと出力するダミーパッケージがインストールされるのでご注意を。moltbotコマンドは入りません。

名称変更の際に第三者にパッケージ名を取得したようですが現在は取り返したようです。

Zo looks really cool and I would love to use it but a lot of pain points mentioned in this post are quite trivial 

It takes less than a few minutes to setup clawdbot (Claude does it anyway) 

the maintenance is minimal. Community is shipping like crazy

and I can self host it on
